alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hunt, northern Hopkins, Delta and Lamar Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Raymond Gary State Park to near Klondike. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Commerce, Cooper, Blossom, Roxton, Lake Crook, Cooper Lake, Powderly, Big Creek Lake, Cooper Lake State Park, Pattonville, Klondike, Camp Maxey, Deport, Tira, Pecan Gap, Novice, Toco, Sun Valley and New Birthright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
